item.title: Integrating a new build tool
item.description: Metals currently supports only sbt through the sbt-metals plugins and metalsSetup task. However, metals does not require sbt and can be integrated with other build tools. The long-term strategy to integrate metals with build tools is to support some standard LSP-inspired protocol. An example of how such a protocol might look like is the draft for a potential “Build Server Protocol”. Until such a protocol becomes more standard, metals can import build metadata through a custom property file format.
